message:
Merge pull request #9535 from MicrosoftDocs/main

Auto Publish – main to live - 2025-08-29 22:04 UTC
ai_summary: This commit modifies four files within the Microsoft Entra documentation. The changes primarily involve updating documentation related to lifecycle workflow tasks, specifically the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task, by clarifying its configuration options and providing example usage. Additionally, there's an update to the PIM documentation regarding role assignments with administrative units, and a minor update to the date in the PIM documentation. Finally, one image file related to risk-based policy impact is updated.

The changes update the date in the metadata and refine the instructions for assigning custom roles with administrative unit scope, providing clearer guidance on where to assign the role and linking to the relevant documentation.

author: rolyon
ai_summary: This commit modifies the documentation for how to add roles to users in Privileged Identity Management (PIM). The change updates a sentence about assigning custom roles with administrative unit scope. Specifically, it changes a link to refer to the "Create or delete administrative units" documentation instead of "Add and remove administrative units".

author: rolyon
ai_summary: This commit updates the documentation for lifecycle workflows in Microsoft Entra, specifically focusing on the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task. The changes include an update to the task description, and the addition of  information about the "daysUntilExpiration" parameter within the argument's structure for use with Microsoft Graph.  Additionally, it also included a change to an image file related to the documentation.

author: rolyon
message: Assign custom role with administrative unit scope
ai_summary: This commit modifies the documentation for adding roles to users in Privileged Identity Management. The changes include updating the "ms.date" to August 29, 2025 and clarifying instructions on assigning custom roles with administrative unit scope.  The updated documentation now provides more specific guidance on how to assign custom roles in the context of administrative units and points users to the correct resources.

author: James Barnett
message:
Merge pull request #9533 from OWinfreyATL/owinfreyATL-AccessPackageAssignmentBehavior-PublicPreview

Assignment package workflow Public Preview
ai_summary: This commit updates the documentation for Lifecycle Workflows in Microsoft Entra ID. The primary change focuses on the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task. The documentation now reflects the ability to customize the task's name, description, and specify the number of days before the assignments are removed. An example of the Microsoft Graph usage is also updated to include new arguments. Additionally, a related image file was also updated.

author: Ortagus Winfrey
ai_summary: This commit modifies the documentation for lifecycle workflow tasks, specifically the task to remove all access package assignments for a user. It adds a description of the arguments expected for the Microsoft Graph parameters within this task, clarifying the "daysUntilExpiration" parameter. The changes involve one addition and no deletions to the `docs/id-governance/lifecycle-workflow-tasks.md` file.

author: Ortagus Winfrey
ai_summary: This commit modifies the documentation for lifecycle workflow tasks in Microsoft Entra ID. Specifically, it updates the documentation for the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task. The changes include adding information about customizing the task to remove assignments immediately or after a delay and also includes the relevant Microsoft Graph parameters to reflect this change. Additionally, a corresponding image file was modified.

author: learn-build-service-prod[bot]
message:
Merge pull request #9531 from MicrosoftDocs/main

Auto Publish – main to live - 2025-08-29 17:04 UTC
ai_summary: This commit modifies several Microsoft Entra ID documentation files related to certificate-based authentication (CBA) and Privileged Identity Management (PIM). Key changes include updates to the CBA documentation to reflect new features like CRL (Certificate Revocation List) validation, CA scoping, and improvements to the certificate revocation process. There are also updates to documentation regarding audit logs in PIM and other minor changes to the documentation. Additionally, some images have been renamed and updated.

author: James Barnett
message:
Merge pull request #9329 from vimrang/CRLChanges

creating new CRL page
ai_summary: This commit introduces significant changes to the documentation related to certificate-based authentication (CBA) in Microsoft Entra ID. Key updates include: a new document explaining the Certificate Revocation List (CRL) in detail, including its functionality and how it works within CBA; updates to other related documents to reference the new CRL document and reflect changes in the product, such as the ability to enforce CRL validation. The changes also involve renaming and moving image files to support the updated documentation.

author: vimrang
ai_summary: This commit modifies the documentation related to certificate-based authentication in Microsoft Entra ID. The changes include a minor update to the text, specifically correcting a typo in a section heading ("CRL error reference"). The commit involved adding one line and deleting one line.

author: v-ccolin
message:
Merge pull request #9495 from barclayn/2025-august-pim-log-history

updating date
ai_summary: This commit updates the documentation for Privileged Identity Management (PIM) audit logs. It adds two new images related to resource and personal audit views, modifies the existing "How to use audit log" article to clarify the purpose of the audit history and how to access it, and updates the access requirements for viewing the logs.  The changes emphasize the use of the "Resource audit" and "My audit" blades within PIM to view role activity.
